question: What annual instalment will discharge a debt of 6450 Rs. due in 4 years at 5% simple interest?
explanation:
Let each instalment be x. Then, 
$latex \\because \\left ( x+\\frac{x\\times 5\\times 1}{100} \\right ) + \\left ( x+\\frac{x\\times 5\\times 2}{100} \\right ) + \\left ( x+\\frac{x\\times 5\\times 3}{100} \\right ) + x = 6450&s=1$
$latex => \\left ( x+\\frac{x}{20} \\right )+\\left ( x+\\frac{x}{10} \\right )+\\left ( x+\\frac{3x}{20} \\right )+x = 6450&s=1$
$latex => \\frac{21x}{20}+\\frac{11x}{10}+\\frac{23x}{20}+x = 6450&s=1$
$latex => \\frac{21x+22x+23x+20x}{20} = 6450&s=1$
$latex => \\frac{86x}{20} = 6450&s=1$
$latex => x = \\frac{6450\\times 20}{86} = 1500 Rs.&s=1$
Hence option [A] is correct answer
